sentences.english: According to elders who say that this is his ancestral home of the BY, and outsiders will never Chuan.
sentences.chinese: 据老辈们讲，这是他家祖传的秘技，绝不传与外人。

sentences.english: This is the most powerful step of them all.
sentences.chinese: 这是本秘技中威力最大的一招。

sentences.english: Yup, American fast food is definitely a recipe to make anybody unhealthy!
sentences.chinese: 是的，美国速食品绝对是一招任谁都得不健康的秘技。

definition: to hand down secret knowledge from generation to generation within a school or family etc
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
secret book or collection of books
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
handed down in a family/family traditions
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
canonical text/treasury (i.e. book of treasured wisdom)
